means: 永久（性）的，永恒的，不变的，耐久的，持久的，经久的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"持久的，永久的"之意。
means: permanent ： 指总是处于相同的情况和地位，可长期持续下去，永久不变。
eternal ： 语体较庄重，侧重指永远存在，无始无终。
perpetual ： 语气最强，指保持永久不变，没有中断的行为，永无止境地持续下去。有时用于贬义，指令人厌烦之事。
everlasting ： 语气较庄重，有时可与eternal换用，侧重持续不尽，或指开始后一直进行下去。
endless ： 系日常用词，指无尽无休。

word_mean: permanent-magnet moving-coil instrument, magnetoelectric instrument 又称“磁电系仪表”。利用可动线圈中的电流与固定的永久磁铁的磁场相互作用而工作的仪表。
行列式展开中各项全取正号。

sentence.Network_en: The museum will have a permanent exhibition of 60 vintage cars.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个博物馆将长期展出60辆老爷车。

sentence.Network_en: They had entered the country and had applied for permanent residence.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们已经入境该国，并申请了永久居留权。

sentence.Network_en: Don't get me wrong, it's interesting work. But it's not permanent.
sentence.Network_cn: 别误会我的意思，这个工作很有意思，可惜不是长期性的。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin permanent- 'remaining to the end' (perhaps via Old French), from per- 'through' + manere 'remain'

entry.def: Something that is permanent lasts for ever.

example.ex: Heavy drinking can cause permanent damage to the brain...
example.tran: 酗酒能造成永久性大脑损伤。
该问题一劳永逸的解决办法

entry.tran: （尤指问题或困难）不断出现的，一直存在的
entry.def: You use permanent to describe situations or states that keep occurring or which seem to exist all the time; used especially to describe problems or difficulties.

example.tran: 他们觉得一直处于威胁之下。

entry.def: A permanent employee is one who is employed for an unlimited length of time.

example.ex: At the end of the probationary period you will become a permanent employee.
example.tran: 试用期结束后,你将成为长期雇员。

entry.def: Your permanent home or your permanent address is the one at which you spend most of your time or the one that you return to after having stayed in other places.

example.ex: York Cottage was as near to a permanent home as the children knew...
example.tran: 在孩子们眼中,约克小屋最像一个安定的家。

entry.def: A permanent is a treatment where a hair stylist curls your hair and treats it with a chemical so that it stays curly for several months.

means.word_mean: 1. a series of waves in the hair made by applying heat and chemicals
1. continuing or enduring without marked change in status or condition or place;
2. not capable of being reversed or returned to the original condition;

auth_sentence.content: Believe me, these people are your permanent shareholders.
auth_sentence.res_content: Believe me, these people are your permanent shareholders.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"贯穿,自始至终;全部"; 2. 表示"假,坏"

stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+enn年+ial的→全年的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+man拿住+ent……的→永久拿住→永恒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+nic毒+ious……的→有毒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+plex重叠+ed……的→重叠在一起→困惑的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了→透视的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
per假,坏+funct作用+ory……的→没起好作用→草率的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+cuss摇动,敲打+ion表名词→一直敲打
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+oxide氧化物→贯穿的氧化物→过氧化物
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+turb搅→直搅乱→扰乱
per假,坏+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚
per假,坏+jur发誓+y状态→假发誓;参考:jury陪审团
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+forate打孔→打孔穿过→打洞
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+fuse流→流遍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弥漫,遍布,散布;渗入,渗透
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+me走+ate表动词→走过去→渗透过去
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+sist站→站到最后→坚持
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+suade劝→一直劝→劝说
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+use利用→[读书的时候]全部利用→细读
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vade走→走遍,遍及
per假,坏+petr石+ate表动词→像石头一样顽固的做坏事→专横,做坏事
per假,坏+vert转→转向坏→堕落

Sentence.sentence: Such books, which only rarely end up in permanent collections, either private or public, will probably only be available as e-books within a few years.
His doctors were puzzled by the strange case of permanent sleeplessness.
The bid went instead to Fuji, which exploited its sponsorship to win a permanent foothold in the marketplace.

sentences.en: The coat gives permanent protection against heavy rain.
He is one of our permanent employees.
sentences.cn: 他是我们的终身雇员之一。

jushi.english: The coat gives permanent protection against heavy rain.
He is one of our permanent employees.
jushi.chinese: 他是我们的永久雇员之一。
